# Edit Initial devenv v2025.08.08

## Multi-Platform C#/TypeScript/SCSS Development Environment

Initial release supporting Arch, Debian, Ubuntu, Fedora, and OpenSUSE, with 19 built-in dark themes.

See [README.md](https://github.com/czirok/devenv/blob/main/README.md) for installation instructions and features.

Ready to create your isolated, visually-unified development environment!

- [devenv.tar.bz2](https://github.com/czirok/devenv/releases/download/v2025.08.08/devenv.tar.bz2)
